name: Project Setup & Navigation Shell
goal: Establish the project foundation with Next.js and create the global navigation structure

tasks.description: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript and App Router
steps: Run npx create-next-app with TypeScript template
Verify project structure uses App Router (app/ directory)
Confirm TypeScript configuration is present (tsconfig.json)
Run npm run dev successfully
Verify default Next.js page loads at localhost:3000
Create folder structure: components/, lib/, types/, stores/
Install core dependencies (if needed): lucide-react for icons
Set up base CSS with CSS variables for theming
Configure path aliases in tsconfig.json (@/ for src)
Verify imports work with @ prefix

tasks.description: Create global layout with persistent navigation toolbar
steps: Create app/layout.tsx with root layout structure
Add navigation toolbar container (fixed position, left or top)
Define base styles for layout (full viewport, flex layout)
Verify layout persists across all routes
Check toolbar remains visible during navigation

tasks.description: Implement navigation icons for all 8 primary views
steps: Add icon for File Browser view
Add icon for Version Graph view
Add icon for Terminal view
Add icon for Skill Builder view
Add icon for Skill Tester view
Add icon for Test Sets view
Add icon for Analysis Sets view
Add icon for Editor/Tabs view
Verify all 8 icons render correctly with tooltips

tasks.description: Create placeholder page components for each view
steps: Create app/files/page.tsx (File Browser)
Create app/versions/page.tsx (Version Graph)
Create app/terminal/page.tsx (Terminal)
Create app/builder/page.tsx (Skill Builder)
Create app/tester/page.tsx (Skill Tester)
Create app/test-sets/page.tsx (Test Sets)
Create app/analysis-sets/page.tsx (Analysis Sets)
Create app/editor/page.tsx (Editor Tabs)
Verify each page renders with placeholder content

tasks.description: Navigation routing works for all views
steps: Click File Browser icon - navigates to /files
Click Version Graph icon - navigates to /versions
Click Terminal icon - navigates to /terminal
Click Skill Builder icon - navigates to /builder
Click Skill Tester icon - navigates to /tester
Click Test Sets icon - navigates to /test-sets
Click Analysis Sets icon - navigates to /analysis-sets
Click Editor icon - navigates to /editor
Browser back/forward navigation works correctly

tasks.description: Active navigation item is visually highlighted
steps: Navigate to /files - File Browser icon shows active state
Navigate to /versions - Version Graph icon shows active state
Navigate to /terminal - Terminal icon shows active state
Navigate to /builder - Skill Builder icon shows active state
Navigate to /tester - Skill Tester icon shows active state
Navigate to /test-sets - Test Sets icon shows active state
Navigate to /analysis-sets - Analysis Sets icon shows active state
Navigate to /editor - Editor icon shows active state
Only one icon is highlighted at a time

tasks.description: Layout maintains structure across all views
steps: Toolbar remains fixed position during scroll
Main content area fills remaining space
Layout works at 1920x1080 resolution
Layout works at 1366x768 resolution
No horizontal scrollbars appear on standard viewports
Icons maintain consistent sizing and spacing
Background uses dark color palette
Navigation toolbar has subtle contrast from main area
Icons use appropriate contrast for visibility
Hover states provide visual feedback
Active states are clearly distinguishable
Typography is readable against dark background

tasks.description: Default route redirects to primary view
steps: Navigate to root URL (localhost:3000)
Verify redirect to /tester (primary testing view) or appropriate default
Corresponding icon shows active state after redirect
